A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: And this is where it all went down hill for SW. This movie is absolute garbage\, More unanswered questions and most from TFA aren't answered. Plot holes. plot holes and more plot holes. Rian Johnson and Kathleen Kennedy both helped destroy the franchise with TLJ. It's not funny no matter how hard it tries (sorry Rian but leave the comedy to others). it's more cliche then TFA and that was not good either. It rips off both The Empire Strikes Back and Return of The Jedi. It destroys the lore of the SW universe and kills Luke Skywalker before he's on screen. The luke you saw in the movie is not Luke. That's the Luke that Rian Johnson wanted to see when he was a kid watching the originals. Rian Johnson is that weird guy at the party. When a group of people are talking about what would happen next in star wars\, Rian Johnson was that guy everyone looked at and said \"WTF are you talking about\, go away.\" Critics want to have you believe that this is the best SW movie ever made.
